item.title: Cookie Policy
item.description:
Managing Cookies

You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. You can also learn more about how Google uses cookies and how to manage them by visiting Google’s Cookie Policy.

Third-Party Cookies

Google AdSense and its partners may use cookies to:

  • Show personalized ads based on your browsing behavior.
  • Measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
  • Provide aggregated analytics on ad performance.

For more details, review the Google Privacy Policy.

Changes to This Policy

We reserve the right to update this Cookie Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
